homePage.title: Veterinary medicines registered in the Republic of Lithuania
homePage.subtitle: An official database that provides detailed information about veterinary medicines registered in Lithuania - their composition, purpose, manufacturers and registration data.
homePage.inputSubtext: You can search by name, active ingredient, indications, registration number or ATCvet code.

footer.vetPrescription: Prescription medicine for veterinary use only
